channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [BEAM-4846] updateOfflineRepositoryRoot broken
item.description:
Migrating the build script to a binary plugin broke the updateOfflineRepositoryRoot task with a less then useful error message:

* Exception is:
org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskExecutionException: Execution failed for task ':updateOfflineRepository'.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Migrating the plugin application outside of the binary plugin did work around the issue. Example work around: https://github.com/lukecwik/incubator-beam/commit/b37fbe96f2d7f035010c5cb3a7a47659995d4aad
